overview:
RenÃ© Seifert (37) is the founder and Managing Director of Level 360 Services in Bangalore, a “flat world”-consultancy for software outsourcing and media-tech investment to India. In addition, RenÃ© has been involved in founding and incubating several internet and tech-companies, also as part of the investor-network MumbaiAngels.

RenÃ©, half German and half Croatian, began his career hosting radio shows and running a small advertisement agency parallel to his studies. He was head of marketing and presenter at the radio station Bayern 3. One of his most challenging experiences had been reporting as a wartime-correspondent for the radio network ARD from the Kosovo-conflict in former Yugoslavia. During the “new economy” he headed the entertainment department at the internet portal Lycos Europe, after which he took one year off for a sabbatical to travel the world.

RenÃ© is a member of the Entrepreneurs’ Organization (chapter Bangalore) and a regular blogger under reneseifert.com. He holds a Master’s Degree in Economics and Management from the University of Augsburg. In his free time he enjoys flying with his pilot license, reading, supporting the Vatsalya Orphanage in Bangalore and - of course - travelling.
